key_risks: Intense competition from established players like SAP, Oracle, and Wolters Kluwer
Dependence on regulated industries subject to regulatory changes
Cybersecurity risks and potential data breaches
Complex and costly pricing structure limiting adoption among smaller organizations
Legal disputes and financial losses impacting profitability
controversies: Recent Cloudflare security incident highlighting potential vulnerabilities
Legal disputes including Dunn v. Workiva Inc. and Sears, Roebuck and Co. v. Workiva Inc.
social_issues: Customer concerns over the platform’s complex and costly pricing structure
governance_issues: Legal disputes and financial losses impacting governance and reputation
